text:
Getting to Nicole Williams and Larry English’s “happily ever after” apparently wasn’t easy.

ET has your exclusive first look at this week’s all-new episode of WAGS LA, which finds the couple finalizing details for their wedding by ring shopping. Problem is, Larry isn’t interested in wearing a wedding band -- and that’s a big issue for Nicole.

“Why would you even think about not having a ring?” Nicole asks her fiance.

“Does it really matter that much?” he asks back.

“Yeah, it matters,” she says. “These are, like, symbols of our marriage and our vows. You’re going to look like one of those guys that decides not to wear a ring for other reasons. I have never seen anybody that’s married not wear a wedding band.”

“Babe, do you know we are marrying?” she continues in a confessional. “Do you want me to go even more crazy than I already am? I mean, it makes me wonder, why are you even playing with my emotions right now? Why are we here? I don’t get it.”

Of course, Nicole and Larry did make it down the aisle successfully back in May. The couple opened up to ET about married life a few months later at Maxim’s Hot 100 Party in Los Angeles, telling us, “Our relationship [turned] into something more amazing.”

“It’s great,” Nicole gushed. “I mean, we’ve been together for six years, so not much has changed, except for maybe, like, saying ‘husband’ feels a little different. Like, every time I say it, like, one of my friends screams. ‘Oh my god! She said husband.’”

“You know, we know each other very well and it’s been a continuation of what things have kinda been like,” Larry added. “But, you know, it was a great, it was a happy moment for both us and, you know, we both are real happy to have made it official.”

WAGS LA airs Sundays at 10 p.m. ET on E!
